messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] October Grandparent Roundup
messages.msgSnippet: This is a great idea!  Wish my parents were more computer active as they could really benifit by this group. ... From: collette deneault
messages.messageBody:
This is a great idea! Wish my parents were more computer active
as they could really benifit by this group.


----- Original Message ----
From: collette deneault <hipgrma@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, October 21, 2007 10:31:50 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] October Grandparent Roundup

Thought I'd do an October post regarding my new Yahoo group for grandparents
of UNschoolers called GRANDleap (a take off from
http://groups. yahoo.com/ group/L-E- A-P ) We're up to 45 members, 12 more
since my September post. I just wanted to remind everyone to ask your
parents if they'd like to hop on board. It doesn't matter where they are in
their thinking. We are all here to support each other. Here's the link.
Thanks! Collette http://groups. yahoo.com/ group/GrandLEAP

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]




__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
